p: Additionally, increased flux of FFA to the liver in the insulin resistant state stimulates production TG and secretion in the form of very-low-density lipoprotein (VLDL). The resulting hypertriglyceridemia leads to lower HDL‐C levels and normal or slightly elevated low-density lipoprotein-cholesterol (LDL-C) levels ( Iqbal et al., 2018). This is related to the typical dyslipidemic profile in MetS.
